ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine actually deleted his character and stopped playin. He wanted to make sure there was no way back into everdrug. After 4 months he mailed
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine actually deleted his character and stopped playin. He
wanted to make sure there was no way back into everdrug. After 4 months he
mailed customer service and they restored his char. Seemed to be a small
thing, he didnt nag or anything , just asked polietely in a single email and
the responded immediately.

So this is just policy, its not enforced at the moment.

Ranina

-----Original Message-----
From: erik [mailto:naslund@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 8:31 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Quick question


> From: "Whitmore, Lance" <lwhitmore@...>
>
> They are kept on the server for 3 months, then deleted there after. Gives
> you time to change your mind. That's at least how the policy stood when I
> was a guide, may have changed since.

While the policy is that they keep the characters for 3 months, Verant has
*never* actually followed thru with that policy. The only "mass deletion"
of characters was before Luclin when they deleted lvl 1 chars from every
account.

I've known people gone for a year that have reactivated their accounts and
their characters were there.

Sulamwen
Pathfinder
E'ci





Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
